original_text: And all the gold of the offering that they offered up to the Lord, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.
korean_text: 천부장과 백부장들이 여호와께 드린 거제의 금의 도합이 만 육천칠백오십 세겔이니

sentences.original_text: And all the gold of the offering
that they offered up to the Lord
and of the captains of hundreds
was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.
